heading: Noise Exemption Application
text: If your event may cause excessive noise that may violate our Noise Bylaw , you need to apply for a temporary noise exemption. Our Noise Bylaw helps to keep neighbourhoods safe and enjoyable for everyone. Please respect your community by following these requirements.

heading: Minor noise exemption requests
text: If your event may cause minor , excessive noise, such as for a limited time or with minimal impact on the community, please submit a noise exemption application at least 14 days prior to the event.

heading: Amplified-sound noise exemption requests

heading: Enforcement
text: Our bylaw enforcement officers and Kingston Police can and will enforce our Noise Bylaw and Nuisance Party Bylaw as necessary to help ensure public safety and respect.
